title: LuJoSoftShutDown v3 [H33T][superl]
description:
Just a little utility update from LuJoSoft Shutdown 2.0.0.0 that get you faster access to the "Turn Off Computer" of Windows Xp. To access this utility move your cursor at the top of screen the bar appears by scrolling down. To leave the utility just move away the cursor and it will scroll back up.

[b]Update from version 2.0.0.0:[/b]
1-Major adjustment on the bar to slide out I put a delay of a second before it come down.
2-Redesign all forms to be transparent.
3-Added drop shadow to all form.
4-Fix a few remains bugs.

[center][img]http://www.lujosoft.net/Download_Free/Coding/LuJoSoftShutDown/form2public.png[/img][/center][center][i]Once you click the timer button this panel comes up[/i][/center][center][i]Here you enter the time to shutdown in minutes[/i][/center]


[center][img]http://www.lujosoft.net/Download_Free/Coding/LuJoSoftShutDown/form3public.png[/img][/center][center][i]At 60 seconds from shutdown this panel will come up[/i][/center][center][i]At the 30 sec left, you will hear a tick[/i][/center]

[b]This utility has six features:[/b]
Turn Off ............ Shutdown the computer to a complete stop.
Restart ............. Shutdown computer and restart it.
Stand By............ Put the computer on standby mode.
Log Off ............. Log the computer off so you can change user.
Timer Turn Off.... Shutdown your computer in any amount of time you want
LuJoSoft............ Open LuJoSoft web page.


[b]Sytem requirement:[/b]
Window Xp, Vista and windows 7.
Windows installer 3.1. [i]if not install the program will install it.[/i]
.Net framework 3.5 SP1. [i]if not install the program will install it.[/i]

[b]Installation:[/b]
Unrar.
Double click the setup file then when finish installing restart your computer or just double click the desktop icon and that it. To use the utility just move your mouse cursor to the center top of the screen and voila the bar scroll down so you can use it. See much faster than doing start, then shutdown and then waiting for the button to appear for closing Windows.

[b]To uninstall:[/b]
Go to Windows add and remove program then search for LuJoSoftShutdown  then click remove and your done. Or in start menu there is a shortcut for uninstall.


Code available on request at [url]http://www.lujosoft.net/Forum/viewtopic.php?f=39&t=145[/url]

Hope you enjoy
